column2: N-TVA; Braf Ca/+; Pten f/f; Ink f/f
Nestin-TVA; Braf het; Pten f/f; Ink f/f

Sac'd three hours after LGX and MEK combination drug treatment. The skull had several growths on it; this was formalin fixed as well. Additionally (although perhaps not of pertinence) there was a mass found just behind the right fore limb.
